official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to cancel certain obligations of the Yahtay Industries, Incorporated, Jemez Pueblo, New Mexico, to the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to cancel certain obligations of the Yahtay Industries, Incorporated, Jemez Pueblo, New Mexico, to the United States.
